reqs: Pre-reqs: A score of 68% or higher in one of MATH 301, MATH 320. (MATH 402 is recommended.)
courseName: Stabilization and Optimal Control of Dynamical Systems
description: Dynamical systems; stability by Liapunov's direct method; controllability and eigenvalue assignment for autonomous linear systems; linear-quadratic regulator, time optimal control, Pontryagin maximum principle, dynamic programming; applications in engineering, economics and resource management.
